weapon.Buff_DartsPhy_SSR_Level0_des: After dodging or using a skill, the next normal attack in 3 seconds has a 100% chance to become a crit hit.
weapon.Buff_DartsPhy_SSR_Level1_des: Increase damage dealt to and all elemental shattering effects on targets within Full Bloom's range by 30%.
weapon.Buff_DartsPhy_SSR_Level3_DownCD_30s_des: Reset all weapon skill cooldowns upon shattering the target's shield. Can only be triggered once every 30 seconds.
weapon.Buff_DartsPhy_SSR_Level3_des: Increase shatter by 15% and reset all weapon skill cooldowns upon shattering the target's shield. Can only be triggered once every 30 seconds.
weapon.Buff_DartsPhy_SSR_Level4_30Ceng_des: Gain 1 stack of refinement via crit. At 30 stacks, clear the cooldown for Full Bloom. Interval of triggering the effect is 0.5 seconds.
weapon.Buff_DartsPhy_SSR_Level5_SkillDamageUp_d: Increase damage of Full Bloom by 10%. The effect can be stacked up to 3 times and lasts for 15 seconds.
weapon.Buff_DartsPhy_SSR_Level5_des: Attacking a grievous target extends the duration of grievous by an additional 7 seconds (only take effect once for the same effect).
weapon.Buff_DartsPhy_SSR_Level6_des: After using Full Bloom, grant a 100% crit chance for the next 8 seconds.
